rules_text:
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Trample
Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tamed Monster. Activate only as a sorcery.
